title: Universal social media scheduler
complaint: I need one tool that posts to Instagram, TikTok, Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, YouTube, Pinterest all at once with different formatting per platform. Bonus if it has AI to rewrite for each platform's tone.
author: u/social_media_burnout
reason: Too broad for a single MVP. Would need 7+ platform APIs, OAuth flows, and content transformation. Existing tools (Buffer, Hootsuite) already solve this. Not buildable as a simple web app.

title: AI that writes my entire thesis
complaint: Can someone build an AI that writes my whole master's thesis? I give it the topic and it gives me 80 pages with proper citations and everything.
author: @grad_struggles
reason: Academic integrity violation. Even if technically feasible, this crosses ethical boundaries. Not a legitimate software problem - it's asking AI to do someone's academic work.

title: Real-time stock trading bot
complaint: Looking for a free web app that auto-trades stocks based on Twitter sentiment. Should connect to my brokerage account and execute trades automatically when crypto influencers tweet.
author: u/daytrader_hopeful
reason: Requires brokerage API integration, real-time data feeds, and financial regulatory compliance. Risk of financial harm. Way beyond MVP scope - this is a fintech product, not a simple web app.

title: Browser extension that removes all ads everywhere
complaint: Every ad blocker misses something. I want one that blocks literally everything - YouTube ads, Spotify ads, Hulu ads, paywalls, cookie banners, newsletter popups, ALL of it. One click install.
author: adblocker_maximalist
reason: Browser extension, not a web app. Would require constant maintenance as platforms change their ad delivery. Existing solutions (uBlock Origin) are better positioned. Cat-and-mouse game with no stable endpoint.
